Class SpatialSimpleFeatureBinningStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.locationtech.geowave.core.geotime.store.query.aggregate.SpatialBinningStrategy<org.opengis.feature.simple.SimpleFeature>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Persistable, BinningStrategy

    public class SpatialSimpleFeatureBinningStrategy
extends SpatialBinningStrategy<org.opengis.feature.simple.SimpleFeature>
    A GeohashBinningStrategy that bins SimpleFeature values.
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpatialSimpleFeatureBinningStrategy

        public SpatialSimpleFeatureBinningStrategy()
        Create a binning strategy using a small number of bins. Usage of this method is not recommended, if you are to use this, it should be through serialization.

      • SpatialSimpleFeatureBinningStrategy

        public SpatialSimpleFeatureBinningStrategy(SpatialBinningType type,
                                           int precision,
                                           boolean useCentroidOnly)
        Parameters:
        type - S2, H3, or GeoHash
        precision - the resolution/length of the hash
        useCentroidOnly - desired behavior for complex geometry such as lines and polygons whether to just aggregate one hash value based on the centroid or to apply the aggregation to all overlapping centroids

    • Method Detail

      • getGeometry

        public org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry getGeometry(org.opengis.feature.simple.SimpleFeature entry)
        Description copied from class: SpatialBinningStrategy
        Extract the geometry from the entry.
        Parameters:
        entry - The entry that will be binned using this strategy.
        Returns:
        The geometry object in the entry, or null if no geometry is found.
